items.MEMBERNAME: The discord username of the member.
items.MEMBERID: The discord ID of the member.
items.MEMBERFULLNAME: The username and discriminator of the member.
items.MEMBERMENTION: The mention of the member (they will be pinged).
items.MEMBERCREATEDDATE: Date the discord user account was created.
items.MEMBERCREATEDDURATION: Duration since the discord user account was created.
items.MEMBERCREATEDSINCE: Time the discord user account was created.
items.INVITECOUNT: Gives the invites count of the inviter.
items.INVITERNAME: The discord username of the inviter.
items.INVITERID: The discord ID of the inviter.
items.INVITERMENTION: The mention of the inviter (user will be pinged).
items.INVITERFULLNAME: The username and discriminator of the inviter.
items.GUILDMEMBERCOUNT: Number of members your server has in total.
items.GUILDNAME: Gives the current name of the server.

main.SLOGAN: The best way to manage your discord server's invites.

regular.DESC:
What's InviteLogger?
InviteLogger is a discord bot that tracks every invites from your discord server. It's code is 100% custom and is not a self-hosted version of Invite Manager (contrary to InviteLogger Classic). InviteLogger is and will remain stable. It also has a dashboard to make the config easier.
regular.ADD: Add the new InviteLogger to your server!

classic.DESC:
Do you want a bot similar to InviteManager?
InviteLogger Classic is a discord bot forked from InviteManager which tracks invites, gives ranks, creates reaction roles, moderates your server and much more! Check it's commands list or it's documentation.
classic.ADD: Add Invitelogger classic to your server!

main.SUPPORTSRV: A problem ? Visit our support server!
